original_text: and where he had first built an altar. There Abram called on the name of the Lord.
korean_text: 그가 처음으로 제단을 쌓은 곳이라 그가 거기서 여호와의 이름을 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: and where he had first built an altar.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 처음으로 제단을 쌓았던 곳에서.

sentences.original_text: There Abram called on the name of the Lord.
